description: Transliteration of Japanese 「desu ne」 (isn't it / right). 「Die si」 = desu, 「Sou die si nei」 = sou desu ne (that's right), 「Ka wa yi die si nei」 = kawaii desu ne (it's cute, isn't it).

examples.translation: Really unfortunate, isn't it (hontou ni zannen desu ne)
It's cute, isn't it (kawaii desu ne)
